description.narrative: The project will foster commercialization of agriculture through interventions to promote diversification into high-value crops (HVCs) and value addition, gender mainstreaming, and climate change adaptation. The project is market oriented and demand driven, and will increase farmers' incomes and enhance food security in Bangladesh.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: The outcome will be improved efficiency and value addition of HVC production. The direct beneficiaries will be marginal, small and medium farmers with landholdings up to 3 hectares. Landless people will benefit through generated employment opportunities in rural areas.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Improved quantity, quality, regularity, and value of HVCs in response to market demand, and public health and environmental requirements

description.narrative: The outcome will be improved efficiency and value addition of HVC production. The direct beneficiaries will be marginal, small and medium farmers with landholdings up to 3 hectares. Landless people will benefit through generated employment opportunities in rural areas.

title.narrative: Women involved in commercial agricultural production and marketing increased by 10% by 2016

description.narrative: The outcome will be improved efficiency and value addition of HVC production. The direct beneficiaries will be marginal, small and medium farmers with landholdings up to 3 hectares. Landless people will benefit through generated employment opportunities in rural areas.

title.narrative: Women's access to rural finance for HVC production and marketing increased by 20% by 2016

description.narrative: The outcome will be improved efficiency and value addition of HVC production. The direct beneficiaries will be marginal, small and medium farmers with landholdings up to 3 hectares. Landless people will benefit through generated employment opportunities in rural areas.
